game_description: The classic puzzle now in VR! Learn how to solve a cube, practice your skills, and compete with others to become the fastest cuber! Current Features: - Free play - Competitive mode with leaderboards - Automatic shuffler and solver - Simple solving guider Planned Features: - More in depth tutorial and solving algorithms - Cube and environment customizations
review_1: When you hold it, it’s very glitchy and can’t turn. I’ll stick to a normal Rubik’s cube. It’s a waste of money
review_2: Like they could make the turning better
review_3: I gave it a two star because there’s nothing really to do besides solve it if you don’t know how waste of money also it’s hard to move the cube other than that still good game
review_4: Let me start off by saying that I’m an avid speed cuber. I love this app. It’s pretty cool despite its jank. My only critique would be that middle layer turns aren’t possible. Please find a way to implement them!
review_5: It works great for what it does, and I'm sure I could get used to it, but one thing I would like that would be a bit hard to make is to allow anything but wrist turns in the hand tracking.
